title: old style text font
author: whatsmytype

comments.content:
The italic subhead looks to be Centaur (but I don't think the headline is the same typeface):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/centaur/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134249/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/centaur/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/centaur/")

For Pasadena Heritage, I think it may be Cycles Nine by Sumner Stone:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stone/cycles/nine-lf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134249/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stone/cycles/nine-lf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stone/cycles/nine-lf/")
Wow! Awesome. Thank you so much!
